Faster

A LOT faster than general purpose search engines!

Easy to navigate to the source code

Navigate to the exact lines where the source code is located with a click.

Features

Semantic Search

Semantic code search instead of textual matching for better results.

Language Support

Currently supports Python, Javascript, Java, and Go.

Query

Search using english queries or code itself.

Permissive Licenses

Only searches for code with explicitly permissive licenses.
